metrics.Error Rate on Approved Claims_explanatio: Proportion of processing errors found in claims that were approved, indicating quality control effectiveness.
metrics.Time to Adjudication Reduction_explanati: Percentage improvement in claim adjudication speed compared to manual processing baseline.
metrics.Claim Denial Rate_explanation: Proportion of claims denied by the system, reflecting accuracy in policy validation and fraud detection.
metrics.Compliance Dashboard Accuracy_explanatio: Accuracy of compliance reporting dashboards in correctly reflecting processed claims data and regulatory status.
metrics.Integration Accuracy_explanation: Correctness of data synchronization and integration with existing insurance management systems.
metrics.Claims Processing Straight-Through Rate_: Percentage of claims processed automatically without requiring manual intervention or review.
metrics.Processing Latency_explanation: Average time in seconds required to process a claim from intake to decision.

drift_summary_explanation: CRITICAL DRIFT ALERT: Model is denying claims from specific provider networks at a significantly higher rate than baseline. Provider network distribution has shifted, with denial rates increasing by 23% for certain network IDs. This triggers an AI GRC risk mitigation workflow requiring immediate investigation.

alerts.message: CRITICAL: Provider network drift detected - 23% increase in denial rates for provider network PN-12345. Human review required for 1,847 affected claims.
